about.description1: NextRun is a startup pioneering a new paradigm in sign language interpretation through AI technology. We are developing innovative photorealistic sign language avatar technology to break down communication barriers between the deaf and hearing communities.
about.description2: By combining Google's MediaPipe, sign-gemma3 model, and advanced motion capture glove technology, we precisely recognize sign language interpreters' movements and render them as natural, realistic avatars.

items.question: How much does sign avatar adoption cost?
items.answer: Pricing varies based on scale and requirements. We offer various plans from basic subscription to enterprise custom solutions. Contact us through the inquiry form for a detailed quote.

items.question: Can I try a demo?
items.answer: Yes, both online demos and offline demonstrations are available. Submit a demo request and our team will contact you to schedule.

items.question: Which sign languages are supported?
items.answer: We currently support Korean Sign Language (KSL). In 2025, we plan to add American Sign Language (ASL) and Japanese Sign Language (JSL) support.

items.question: Is API integration available?
items.answer: Yes, you can easily integrate with existing systems via REST API. We provide detailed technical documentation and SDK.
